alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:40PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Crockett, southern Weakley, Gibson, northwestern Carroll, central Haywood and northwestern Madison Counties through 415 PM CST... At 340 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rutherford to near Belle Eagle to 9 miles west of Brownsville. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fairview, Dresden, Alamo, Bells, Dyer, Greenfield, Three Way, Gleason, Kenton, Rutherford, Bradford, Sharon, Atwood, Belle Eagle and Holly Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
